about_the_game:
This is a High Resolution Character Creation DLC for "Students of Light Bonds - Typing RPG with Character Creation -".
You can take each color-customized character's photo as a 2048x4096 pixels (*) PNG image file with transparent background.

To take character's photo, go to "[DLC] Take Hi-Res Photo" on the Character Creation menu.

(*) Includes padding. Actual image size for each characters (after trimming the padding) are following.
  • Boy A : 1390x3748 pixels
  • Boy B : 1543x3688 pixels
  • Boy C : 1282x3659 pixels
  • Boy D : 1330x3792 pixels
  • Boy E : 1110x3715 pixels
  • Girl A : 1534x3762 pixels
  • Girl B : 1795x3769 pixels
  • Girl C : 1499x3659 pixels
  • Girl D : 1359x3720 pixels
  • Girl E : 1863x3213 pixels

Terms of use for generated PNG files

The generated images using this DLC must be used for personal use only.
Do not copy or reproduct these images.
In addition, if you refund this DLC, you must delete these images.
